ENTER_MOBILE: Enter your 10 digit mobile number to login to your account
AADHAR_HINT:
Enter your 12-digit Aadhaar or 16-digit Virtual ID.
 Keep your Aadhaar linked mobile number handy.
AADHAR_TOOLTIP_TEXT: Keep your PAN & Aadhaar/Virtual ID card handy.
AADHAR_VALIDATION_ERROR: Aadhaar number can not started with 0 or 1
ENTER_OTP: Enter the OTP sent to your mobile number registered with Aadhaar.
MOBILE_ENTER_OTP: Enter the OTP sent to your mobile number.
ENTER_OTP_EXISTING_CUST: Enter the OTP sent to your mobile number
OTP_HINT:
Enter the OTP sent to your mobile number 
 registered with Aadhaar
POPUP_SUBTEXT: We have two product offerings for you.
AADHAR_TOOL_TIP: VID is a temporary, revocable 16-digit random number mapped with the Aadhaar number. VID can be used in lieu of Aadhaar number whenever authentication or e-KYC services are performed. Authentication may be performed using VID in a manner similar to using Aadhaar number.
READ_TERMS: Please read the terms and conditions carefully before accepting it.
FUNDING_AMT_TXT1: Please enter a funding amount between ₹10,000 - ₹1,00,000
FUNDING_AMT_TXT2: Please enter a funding amount between ₹25,000 - ₹1,00,000
SOMETHING_WENT_WRONG: Something went wrong. Please try again
AADHAR_CONSENT: By proceeding, I consent to use my Aadhaar to fetch KYC details from UIDAI and use the same for opening an account with IDFC FIRST Bank.
SUCCESSFULLY_OPENED_SAVING_ACCTOUNT: You have successfully opened your IDFC FIRST savings account. Start exploring all the services by logging in with your mobile number.
QUIT_APPLICATION: Are you sure you want to exit the application?
LOST_DATA: If you quit the page you will lost your current data.
PID_LOST_DATA: Please note that your data will be saved and you will be able to resume the journey from where you left off.
EXIT_APP_BTN_TITLE: Yes, I want to exit the application
SELECT_NOMINEE_DATE: Please select nominees date of birth
DROP_JOURNY_MODAL_DESCRIPTION: As you are our existing user, we have saved your previous inputs. Please continue your savings account journey where you last left off.
PAYMENT_FAILED_HEADER_SUB_TXT: Your payment has failed due to a technical error. Please try again in a bit.
AADHAR_PROCCED_CONCENT:
